actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the status of preference eligible to certain spouses of veterans who served on active duty in the Armed Forces in the Vietnam era.

summary.text: Extends the existing status of preference eligible pursuant to the competitive service provisions of Federal law pertaining to Federal employment to specified spouses of veterans who served on active duty in the Armed Forces to those wives of veterans of the Vietnam era. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 2108(1)(A))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the status of preference eligible to certain spouses of veterans who served on active duty in the Armed Forces in the Vietnam era.
